attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime minister has given away approx $60 million to palestine.

This money is needed for us the UK taxpayers, and could be going on issues such as fuel, car tax and higher wages for nurses.

So when the government tell us that they are increasing car tax, this is why because they give away tips on holidays.

I am loosing faith in this labour government its time for them to wise up,call an election, AND STOP WASTING MONEY

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
